thread.title: SEEK HELP: Watch Shia LaBeouf completely lose it in confrontation with Trump supporter
thread.title_full: SEEK HELP: Watch Shia LaBeouf completely lose it in confrontation with Trump supporter

author: Greg P.
title: SEEK HELP: Watch Shia LaBeouf completely lose it in confrontation with Trump supporter
text:
SEEK HELP: Watch Shia LaBeouf completely lose it in confrontation with Trump supporter Posted at 7:40   Greg P.   
This just isn’t normal. 
Check out Shia LaBeouf screaming at some Trump supporter who showed up to his art project/anti-Trump protest lifestream in Astoria, Queens : Shia LaBeouf has near meltdown after Trump supporter shows up to his 4-year protest livestream pic.twitter.com/Zn9O9Z9GGQ 
— Breaking911 (@Breaking911) January 22, 2017 
Here’s a different angle: Mr. LaBeouf shouting down a white supremacist earlier. This thing has been a fascinating watch so far. #HeWillNotDivideUs pic.twitter.com/i0J6oq3BLt 
Basically the 30-year-old actor has set up a camera outside of the Museum of the Moving Image in Queens, New York where people can stop by and shout, “He will not divide us” into the camera 24/7: Shia LaBeouf Vows To Livestream For FOUR YEARS. 24 Hours A Day. YUP. (via @PopCrush ) https://t.co/IRr3z6pb1s
